title: Prepare Marinade
description: In a bowl, combine yogurt, ginger-garlic paste, turmeric, red chili powder, coriander powder, garam masala, lemon juice, and salt. Mix well to form a marinade.

title: Marinate Chicken
description: Add chicken pieces to the marinade along with green chilies, half of the mint and coriander leaves. Mix thoroughly and cover. Refrigerate for at least 4 hours or overnight.

title: Parboil the Rice
